Interface ICorfuPayload<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITypedEnum<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

      • mapFromBuffer

        static <K,V> Map<K,V> mapFromBuffer(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                    Class<K> keyClass,
                                    Class<V> valueClass)
        A really simple flat map implementation. The first entry is the size of the map as an int, and the next entries are each key followed by its value. Maps of maps are currently not supported.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type of the keys.
        V - The type of the values.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to deserialize.
        keyClass - The class of the keys.
        valueClass - The class of the values.
        Returns:
        Map

      • setFromBuffer

        static <V> Set<V> setFromBuffer(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                Class<V> valueClass)
        A really simple flat set implementation. The first entry is the size of the set as an int, and the next entries are each value.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The type of the values.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to deserialize.
        valueClass - The class of the values.
        Returns:
        Set of value types

      • listFromBuffer

        static <V> List<V> listFromBuffer(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                  Class<V> valueClass)
        A really simple flat list implementation. The first entry is the size of the set as an int, and the next entries are each value.
        Type Parameters:
        V - The type of the values.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to deserialize.
        valueClass - The class of the values.
        Returns:
        List of values types

        static <V extends Comparable<V>> com.google.common.collect.RangeSet<V> rangeSetFromBuffer(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                                                                          Class<V> valueClass)
        A really simple flat set implementation. The first entry is the size of the set as an int, and the next entries are each value.
        Type Parameters:

        valueClass - The class of the values.

      • enumMapFromBuffer

        static <K extends Enum<K> & ITypedEnum<K>,V> EnumMap<K,V> enumMapFromBuffer(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                                                            Class<K> keyClass,
                                                                            Class<V> objClass)
        A really simple flat map implementation. The first entry is the size of the map as an int, and the next entries are each value.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type of the keys
        V - The type of the values.
        Parameters:
        buf - The buffer to deserialize.
        keyClass - The class of the keys.
        objClass - The class of the values.
        Returns:
        Map for use with enum type keys

      • serialize

        static <T> void serialize(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer,
                          T payload)
        Serialize a payload into a given byte buffer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the payload.
        Parameters:
        payload - The Payload to serialize.
        buffer - The buffer to serialize it into.
